name: A Bag of Zeny
description: A bag full of Zeny, You can receive a lot of Zeny by opening or selling it.

name: A Bottle of Water
description: A bottle with water, it can be used to compose hair dye or color dye.

name: A Gift
description: A gift from Big Cat to friends who have contributed to constructing this world. Big Cat thanks you for your outstanding contribution to RO's market and business publicity! In the days to come, we hope your love for RO can influence more people. Open the gift to receive 7, 128, 000 Zeny. The gift can only be collected once in a lifetime by each account.

name: A.T. Field Toy Back Headwear
description: Awaken to fulfill your own wish.

name: Absolute Field
description: Creates a space of high latitudes which belongs to you only. Enjoy! (Uses per day: 3)

name: Absolute Field-Star
description: "Not only kids yearn for the stars". Creates a space of high latitudes which belongs to you only. Enjoy! (Uses per day: 3)

name: Abysmal Knight Shield
description: Few people can see Abysmal Knight using the shield. However, the giant black shield can often be found after it is eliminated. The badge of the Knight Club on the shield is already blurred.

name: Abysmal Knight Shield Blueprint
description: Few people can see Abysmal Knight using the shield. However, the giant black shield can often be found after it is eliminated. The badge of the Knight Club on the shield is already blurred.

name: Abyss Flower
description: Plant that glows in the middle of the night, alone in a rare forest. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Acid Bottle
description: The one injured by the potion will suffer from serious harm all over the body, so don't throw it on persons.

name: Action-Adventurer's Bow!
description: Use this item to unlock a new action.

name: Action-Heart!
description: Use this item to unlock a new action.

name: Action-Kneel Down!
description: Use this item to unlock a new action.

name: Action-Lean!
description: Use this item to unlock a new action.

name: Action-Lie Down!
description: Use this item to unlock a new action.

name: Active Garrison Supply Pack
description: A supply pack provided to active members by the Cosmic Garrison Open to gain guaranteed 100x Ultraman’s Cosmic Breath

name: Activity Stone
description: Use to become immune to Petrify for 1 min. Cannot work with [Whisper Stone] [Sleepless Stone] and [Warm Stone].
